history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />.
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER driving directions
TTS <speak> No problem. <break strength='strong' /> I will give you driving directions to your destination. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where are you going?
USER Shady Side Hospital of UPMC
TTS Okay, going to upmc shadyside. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where are you leaving from?
USER Monroeville Mall
TTS Okay, leaving from monroeville mall. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you wanna travel?
USER 3 o'clock
TTS Okay, travelling at 03:00 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER no.
TTS <speak> Sounds good. <break strength='strong' /> Let me know if you didn't understand a step, and I'll repeat it for you. </speak>
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 3 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 24 minutes.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Head west on Mall Cir Dr toward Don Dr. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER baby
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER Absolutely.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Turn right at the 1st cross street onto Don Dr. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Keep left at the fork, follow signs for Pittsburgh and merge onto US-22 BUS west. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER Yeah.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Merge onto I-376 W/US-22 west via the ramp on the left to Pittsburgh. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER Yeah.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take exit 73B to merge onto PA-885 N/Bates St toward Oakland. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Continue straight onto Bates St. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER Yeah.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Turn left onto south Bouquet St. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER Yeah.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Sharp right onto Joncaire St. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Slight left onto Boundary St. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Boundary St turns slightly left and becomes south Neville St. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Turn right onto Ellsworth avenue. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Turn left onto Devonshire St. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Turn right onto Centre avenue. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Turn right. Destination will be on the right. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> </speak>
TTS <speak> Would you like to hear an alternate route?</speak>
